com.madrobot.log

Class LoggerStrategyLogFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.log.LoggerStrategyLogFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerStrategy

    public class LoggerStrategyLogFile
extends Object
implements LoggerStrategy
    Simple log file strategy.

    Creates a simple log at the path mentioned in the initializer.
    The SDCard write permission needs to be set for this logging strategy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggerStrategyLogFile(String directory, String fileName)
      Creates a new Log file strategy instance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void removeOldLogFiles()
      Removes all other files at the given log directory except the current one.

        Creates a new Log file strategy instance
        Parameters:
        directory - of the log file
        fileName - of the log file

    • Method Detail

      • removeOldLogFiles

        public void removeOldLogFiles()
        Removes all other files at the given log directory except the current one.

        Note: all files even if not a log file will be deleted from the given directory.
